name: Delivery Date checkout for Woocommerce
author: ABS creative

sections.description:
Ability to allow the customer to select Delivery date & time on the checkoutpage for the orders.

You can set the delivery date and time fields mandatory on the checkout page for woocommerce.

When we checkout Process at that time when customer need to identify when delivery excpect customer for that use we need to know Delivery Date for Woocommerce.
so delivery date checkout for woocommerce and delivery Time Woocommerce plugin provide powerful feature to setup woocommerce checkout page in Delivery Date selection option.

Plugin Features

  • Set Business Days & Delivery Days separately with date setting on delivery date
  • add custom message and monetizing you message in this plugin
  • set starting date And ending date coustmized
  • If you not selected starting , ending date and workday so it show all day enable from current date to all days
  • Delivery Date show on Customer Order Page, Dashboard Order Edit page and in mail.
  • Reschedule Order Deliveries by Customer or Admin
sections.faq:
Why Plugin Use

This plugin add delivery date and delivery time in checkout page woocommerce.
